"Energy signal approaching" :::says the newly constructed computer:::

"Bring up its files" :::Defection commands:::

"Death storm...Predicon"

:::Defection waits:::
"Is that all?... Well I better prepare myself  he probably wants to kill me!"

::Defection goes to the mouth of the cave and stands there:::

:::Defection:::"Well... looks like this will get bloody after all!"
